articles.author: Julia Musto
articles.title: NASA spacecraft makes first Earth flyby after 17-year journey - Fox News
articles.description: NASA's STEREO-A spacecraft, which launched in 2006, is passing between the sun and Earth on Saturday for the first Earth flyby of the nearly 17-year-old mission.
articles.content:
NASA said its STEREO-A spacecraft is passing between the sun and Earth on Saturday. 
The visit marks the first Earth flyby of the nearly 17-year-old mission.
